experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: Timeless Beauty
experience.description: We infuse our products with revitalizing, scientifically-rich signature formulas that give skin new life and energy, revealing the miraculous beauty of frozen time.

origin.title: Brand Origin
origin.description: Since its founding in 2020, Beautiful Diary has been committed to combining Eastern traditional beauty wisdom with modern advanced skincare technology. We deeply research the fusion of traditional Chinese herbal essences and modern biotechnology, dedicated to exquisite formulations, exceptional quality, and unparalleled experiences. Beautiful Diary passionately provides top-tier skincare solutions that exceed expectations. Our mission is to enhance quality of life and reveal timeless natural beauty.

footer.copyright: ICP Registration No.: Shanghai ICP No. xxx

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.description: Rooted in Chinese traditional beauty culture, Beautiful Diary combines millennia of herbal wisdom with modern biotechnology, integrating advanced anti-aging technology with precious natural ingredients. Inspired by the fusion of Eastern aesthetics and modern technology, we meticulously craft top-tier skincare solutions to enhance quality of life and reveal timeless beauty.

sections.title: Inheriting Eastern Beauty Wisdom
sections.description: China has a long-standing traditional beauty culture, leading innovation in skincare and cosmetics from ancient court secrets to modern technological research. From the herbal essences of the Compendium of Materia Medica to today's modern biotechnology, we continuously inherit and innovate rejuvenating science.

sections.title: Born in China
sections.description: Beautiful Diary was born in China and represents domestic high-end beauty brands. We deeply explore traditional Chinese herbal essences, combining modern biotechnology and advanced skincare technology, dedicated to creating exclusive skincare solutions for Asian women. In the context of the new era, Beautiful Diary has become a leader in domestic beauty innovation, and this pioneering approach is shaping the entire industry.

ourIntroduction.title: Our Introduction
ourIntroduction.description: Beautiful Diary is a domestic beauty brand focused on high-end skincare, committed to combining modern advanced anti-aging technology with precious natural herbal ingredients, providing exceptional skincare experiences for every woman pursuing beauty.

sections.title: Brand Philosophy
sections.description: Beautiful Diary believes that true beauty comes from inner health and vitality. Through scientific formulations and exquisite craftsmanship, we help skin restore its youthful state and reveal natural beauty.

sections.title: Core Values
sections.description: We insist on using the finest raw materials and adopting the most advanced technology to ensure that every product brings significant improvement effects to the skin.

ourTechnology.title: Our Technology
ourTechnology.description: Beautiful Diary adopts modern advanced skin repair technology and nano-nutrient delivery systems to ensure active ingredients can penetrate deep into the skin layers and exert maximum efficacy.

sections.title: Skin Repair Technology
sections.description: We use cutting-edge skin repair technology that can precisely identify and repair damaged skin tissue, promote collagen production, and restore skin elasticity and firmness.

sections.title: Nano-Nutrient Delivery
sections.description: Through unique nano-nutrient delivery technology, we can directly deliver precious active ingredients to the deep layers of the skin, ensuring nutrients are fully absorbed and utilized.

ourStrategy.title: Our Strategy
ourStrategy.description: Beautiful Diary is committed to becoming a globally leading high-end skincare brand, providing the highest quality skincare solutions to global consumers through continuous innovation and exceptional quality.

sections.title: Innovation & R&D
sections.description: We continuously invest in R&D, constantly exploring new skincare technologies and ingredients to ensure our products remain at the industry forefront.

sections.title: Global Expansion
sections.description: Beautiful Diary is expanding its business globally, establishing strategic alliances with top research institutions and partners to jointly promote the development of the skincare industry.

joinUs.title: Franchise Partnership
joinUs.subtitle: Join Beautiful Diary, Create a Wealthy Future Together
joinUs.description: Beautiful Diary sincerely invites ambitious individuals to join our franchise system and jointly explore the high-end skincare market. We provide comprehensive brand support, professional operational guidance, and generous profit returns, looking forward to working together for mutual success.

sections.title: Why Choose to Join Beautiful Diary
sections.description: As a high-end skincare brand, Beautiful Diary has strong brand influence and market competitiveness. By joining us, you will receive comprehensive support, including brand authorization, product supply, marketing support, training guidance, etc., making your entrepreneurial journey smoother.
features: Strong brand influence and market recognition
Complete product system and continuous new product support
Professional marketing promotion and training guidance
Generous profit margins and flexible franchise policies

sections.title: Franchise Advantages
sections.description: We provide comprehensive support services for franchisees, from site selection and decoration to operational management, from product training to marketing promotion, assisting you throughout the process to quickly launch and achieve continuous profitability.

sections.title: Our Commitment
sections.description: We promise to provide fair cooperation opportunities for every franchise partner, respect every partner, provide continuous support and services, and are committed to creating a mutually beneficial cooperation environment for mutual development and growth.

qrCodeModal.title: Scan to Purchase
qrCodeModal.description: Use WeChat to scan the QR code below to visit the official mini-program for purchase

allProductsSection.title: All Products
allProductsSection.description: Explore Beautiful Diary's complete product collection and discover your exclusive skincare solution

products.title: Life Matrix Collection
products.description: The Life Matrix Collection is Beautiful Diary's masterpiece of time reversal, combining traditional herbal essences with modern biotechnology. Meticulously crafted to awaken youthful vitality, this prestigious collection combines cutting-edge skincare technology with unique active complexes and nano-nutrient delivery technology, precisely targeting multiple aging pathways. Rich in powerful revitalizing active ingredients, it restores skin's youthful vitality from within, providing an unparalleled luxurious anti-aging experience.

benefitDetails: Dual intensive care meticulously developed for those who demand perfect skin.
After 15 minutes of use, improves skin texture; skin radiance, smoothness, plumpness, hydration, and overall skin quality are significantly enhanced.*
After 4 weeks of use, skin firmness and elasticity are significantly improved, skin becomes smoother, revealing youthful vitality.*
After 8 weeks of use, plumps collagen fibers.*

products.title: Platinum Collection
products.description: The Platinum Collection is the pinnacle of Beautiful Diary's luxurious skincare, combining precious platinum ingredients with advanced anti-aging technology. Each product is carefully formulated by Beautiful Diary, designed to bring ultimate rejuvenation experience to the skin. Through unique formulations and exceptional craftsmanship, it helps restore skin firmness, elasticity, and radiance, revealing unparalleled luxurious beauty.

benefitDetails: Dual intensive care meticulously developed for those who demand perfect skin.
After 15 minutes of use, improves skin texture; skin radiance, smoothness, plumpness, hydration, and overall skin quality are significantly enhanced.*
After 4 weeks of use, skin firmness and elasticity are significantly improved, skin becomes smoother, revealing youthful vitality.*
After 8 weeks of use, plumps collagen fibers.*

products.title: Caviar Collection
products.description: The Caviar Collection is Beautiful Diary's meticulously crafted firming and lifting series, centered on precious caviar extracts, combined with advanced firming and lifting technology, bringing exceptional firming and lifting effects to the skin. Beautiful Diary's unique formula can penetrate deep into the skin layers, activate collagen production, effectively improve skin sagging and drooping issues, allowing the skin to regain a youthful, firm state.

benefitDetails: Dual intensive care meticulously developed for those who demand perfect skin.
After 15 minutes of use, improves skin texture; skin radiance, smoothness, plumpness, hydration, and overall skin quality are significantly enhanced.*
After 4 weeks of use, skin firmness and elasticity are significantly improved, skin becomes smoother, revealing youthful vitality.*
After 8 weeks of use, plumps collagen fibers.*

products.title: Pure White Collection
products.description: The Pure White Collection is Beautiful Diary's professional series focused on skin brightening and firming, helping skin restore pure, translucent radiance through unique brightening formulas and firming technology. Beautiful Diary products can effectively fade spots, even skin tone, while improving skin firmness, allowing the skin to present a natural, pure beautiful state.

products.title: Golden Radiance Collection
products.description: The Golden Radiance Collection is Beautiful Diary's revitalizing series crafted with golden luxurious texture, bringing dual effects of revitalization and nourishment to the skin. Rich in precious golden ingredients and nourishing essences, it can deeply nourish the skin and restore skin vitality and radiance. Beautiful Diary's unique formula allows the skin to radiate golden brilliance, showcasing unparalleled luxurious charm.
